level_1.skillDescription:
Launch an area attack at a designated spot
Continuously deals earth elemental damage and strengthens status ailments

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the duration of the damaging area

level_3.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 3rd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the duration of the damaging area

abilities.skillDescription: Reduces the time required to reach max charge
Applies the Speed Down status effect to enemies
